class riscv32_isg.SyntaxGenerator

Bases: object

Generates instruction syntax based on type

_gen_b_type(spec, constraints)

Generate B-type: rs1, rs2, label

Return type:

str

_gen_ca_type(spec, constraints)

Generate CA-type: rd’/rs1’, rs2’

Return type:

str

_gen_cb_type(spec, constraints)

Generate CB-type: rs1’, offset or rs1’, imm

Return type:

str

_gen_ci_type(spec, constraints)

Generate CI-type: rd, imm or special formats

Return type:

str

_gen_ciw_type(spec, constraints)

Generate CIW-type: rd’, uimm

Return type:

str

_gen_cj_type(spec, constraints)

Generate CJ-type: offset

Return type:

str

_gen_cl_type(spec, constraints)

Generate CL-type: rd’, offset(rs1’)

Return type:

str

_gen_cr_type(spec, constraints)

Generate CR-type: rd, rs2 or single register

Return type:

str

_gen_cs_type(spec, constraints)

Generate CS-type: rs2’, offset(rs1’)

Return type:

str

_gen_csr_type(spec, constraints)

Generate CSR-type: rd, csr, rs1

Return type:

str

_gen_css_type(spec, constraints)

Generate CSS-type: rs2, offset(sp)

Return type:

str

_gen_i_type(spec, constraints)

Generate I-type: rd, rs1, imm

Return type:

str

_gen_j_type(spec, constraints)

Generate J-type: rd, label

Return type:

str

_gen_label()

Generate a unique label

Return type:

str

_gen_r_type(spec, constraints)

Generate R-type: rd, rs1, rs2

Return type:

str

_gen_s_type(spec, constraints)

Generate S-type: rs2, offset(rs1) or rd, offset(rs1) for loads

Return type:

str

_gen_u_type(spec, constraints)

Generate U-type: rd, imm or rd, label

Return type:

str

_generate_addi16sp_sequence()

Generate ADDI16SP + filler + ADDI16SP sequence

Return type:

str

_generate_compressed_jump_sequence()

Generate AUIPC + filler + compressed jump sequence (for both c.jr and c.jalr)

Return type:

str

_generate_jalr_sequence()

Generate AUIPC + filler + JALR sequence

Return type:

str

_generate_stack_pointer_sequence(spec)

Generate sequence for c.lwsp/c.swsp that sets up SP to point to inline buffer with interleaved filler

Return type:

str

generate(spec, constraints=None)

Generate operands for given syntax type

Return type:

str

class riscv32_isg.SyntaxType(value)

Bases: Enum

Instruction syntax patterns - base instruction formats from RISC-V ratified specification

B_TYPE = 'b_type'
CA_TYPE = 'ca_type'
CB_TYPE = 'cb_type'
CIW_TYPE = 'ciw_type'
CI_TYPE = 'ci_type'
CJ_TYPE = 'cj_type'
CL_TYPE = 'cl_type'
CR_TYPE = 'cr_type'
CSR_TYPE = 'csr_type'
CSS_TYPE = 'css_type'
CS_TYPE = 'cs_type'
I_TYPE = 'i_type'
J_TYPE = 'j_type'
R_TYPE = 'r_type'
S_TYPE = 's_type'
